extension.description:
A Confluence ZEITGEIST – a modern reimagination of Confluence, the beloved long-time default user interface of Kodi (formerly XBMC).
Features include a complete graphical overhaul, an icon-based main menu without the need for scrolling and all new wall views. The useful lightweight features among countless carefully crafted usability optimizations make you enjoy an intuitive user experience you would expect from a retail media player with an awesome UI.

! Reworked and expanded rating scores support
Visual rating score indicators now support local ratings from your Kodi database.

# rotten romatoes ListItem.Rating(tomatometerallcritics) ListItem.Rating(rottentomatoes)
# rotten tomatoes audience rating ListItem.Rating(tomatometerallaudience)
# metacritic ListItem.Rating(metacritic) ListItem.Rating(metascore)
